title: T206 Speaker PSA 4.5 and Mathewson Dark PSA 4 SOLD
author: Throttlesteer

posts.post_title: T206 Speaker PSA 4.5 and Mathewson Dark PSA 4 SOLD
posts.post_content:
T206 Tris Speaker Piedmont 350 PSA 4.5 - Great centering, lights-out registration, tremendous eye appeal SOLD (insured shipping included).


T206 Christy Mathewson Sweet Cap 350 PSA 4 - Nice, bold color. Decent centering.  A little lower end for the grade by today's standards, but reflected in the price.  SOLD net to me (insured shipping included)

First "I'll take it" gets it.

Refreshing honesty. If this had been a recent banned member, poor Matty would have been described as "severely undergraded" :) PM sent. Thanks Anson!

Mike

Matty is Sold! Thanks Anson! 

Peace, Mike
